channel.title: Deltascape NPC Help
channel.description:
Hello once again I need help with npc's
Thanks to moparscape forums I finally got the npcs speaking but now
I want 2 to say
Owner tom is online and one saying Owner Jamie is online

item.title: Deltascape NPC Help
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

if (npcs[i].npcType == 593) { if (misc.random2(10) <= 3) //this is the time delay { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("NAME")) { npcs[i].textUpdate = "NAME is ONLINE"; } else { npcs[i].textUpdate = "NAME is OFFLINE"; } } }

Read full topic
